alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 12 at 1:51PM MST until February 16 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Castle Rock, Limon, and Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
